t: The*pn Lord*s reigns! Let the earth rejoice; let*ln the many coasts and islands be glad.
Clouds*pn and total darkness surround him; righteousness*ln and justice are the foundation of his throne.
Fire*ln goes before him and*ln burns up his foes on every side.
His*ln lightning lights up the world; the*ln earth sees and trembles.
The*ln mountains melt like wax at*ln the presence of the Lord—*s at*ln the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.
The*pn heavens proclaim his righteousness; all*ln the peoples see his glory.
All*pn who serve carved images, those*ln who boast in worthless idols, will be put to shame. All*ln the gods must worship him.
Zion*pn hears and is glad, Judah’s*ln villages rejoice because*ln of your judgments, Lord.*s
For*ln you, Lord,*s are*ln the Most High over the whole earth; you*ln are exalted above all the gods.
You*pn who love the Lord,*s hate evil! He*ln protects the lives of his faithful ones; he*ln rescues them from the power of the wicked.
Light*ln dawns for the righteous, gladness*ln for the upright in heart.
Be*ln glad in the Lord,*s you righteous ones, and*ln give thanks to his holy name.
